lyrics:
4 contributorssettle for my love lyricsverse 1 aaries musiq soulchild both
your love means the world to me
words could not express the joy you bring
your love moves me tenderly
to have you by my side means everything i sing
your love has the best of me
if i could give you more then that would be yeah

chorus aaries
settle for my love settle for my kiss
settle for my love that youll never miss
so dear to me darling take my hand
settle for my kiss
cause its all i can give
settle for my love that youll never miss

verse 2 aaries with musiq soulchild
your love it means the world to me
oohhoo like the ocean wide your love runs deep
your love oh baby it moves me tenderly
like the birds outside my window sing

chorus aaries musiq soulchild
settle for my love oh settle for settle for my kiss hey hey hey
settle for my love that youll never miss yeah
so dear to me darling take my hand
settle for my kiss
cause thats all i can give
settle for my love baby that youll never miss
see musiq soulchild liveget tickets as low as 50you might also likebridge aaries musiq soulchild
i cant bring you precious stars or paradise
and all these things are really on my mind
all that i can give to you is love so true
from the heart ooh

verse 3 aaries with musiq soulchild
your love it means the world to me means the world
no words no words express the joy you bring
your love oh it has the best of me
if i if i can only give you everything baby

chorus aaries musiq soulchild
settle for my love settle for my kiss hey hey hey
settle for my love oh that youll never miss
so dear to me darling take my hand
settle for my kiss
cause thats all i can give
settle for my love baby yeah yeah that youll never miss hey

outro aaries musiq soulchild
